s1.title:
Complete tasks 
and get bonuses
s1.description:
Complete different tasks from 
the easiest to the most difficult and 
get bonuses. The harder 
the tasks, the more bonuses you 
can get!

s2.title:
Join a team 
or create your own
s2.description:
You can create your own 
team of 
friends or professional esports players, or 
join an existing 
team with cool players!

s3.title:
Get 
real prizes
s3.description:
The best players will receive cool 
prizes, so go ahead, fighters!

welcome.title: Welcome to MatchUp
welcome.label:
This is a platform for ranked 
matches outside of Standoff 2.

resetPassword.title: Password reset
resetPassword.hint: An email will be sent to you with detailed instructions on how to change your password.

shopDetail.countryHint:
If your country is not on the list, please contact the 
administrator in our social networks. networks for 
details.

modes.AWMDMDescription: AWMDM - Do you want to train your accuracy and speed? Then the sniper PVP mode is for you! In this mode, you can test your AIM and reaction.
modes.HSDMDescription: HSDM - In this mode, you can hone your skills to quickly and accurately hit your opponent, since in this mode damage is counted only in the head!
modes.oneVSoneDescription: 1 vs 1 - Do you want to become the best in fights? Then the 1 vs 1 mode is for you! Here you can show your skills in battles with an opponent, hone your new ones and become the best!
modes.trainingDescription: Training is a mode in which you can play in the same team with your friends. You can also play alone, but without a rating.
modes.proLeagueDescription: Pro League is a mode in which players of the highest level compete against each other and receive unique rewards not available in other modes.
modes.proLeagueLockedMessage:
Reach level 8 
to unlock the mode
modes.masterLeagueDescription: Master League is a mode for players with a rating level of 5, a special matchmaking system has also been developed for it
modes.masterLeagueLockedMessage:
Reach level 5 
to unlock the mode
modes.premierLeagueDescription: Ranking Mode, a mode through which you can play ranked games and move up in the top players
modes.premierLeagueLockedMessage:
To unlock the mode 
purchase a Premium subscription

mathLobby.startGameDescription: To start the selection of opponents, click 'Start the game'

refill.creditCardLabel: We accept Visa, Mastercard and Mir

versionModal.title: The new version is already available!
versionModal.subtitle: You don't have the latest version of the app

inviteModal.invite:
You are invited 
to the lobby

report.reportTitle: Have a complaint about a player?
report.reportText: Leave your comment about this player and he will be considered

refillModal.text: To refill your account, contact the administrator in the VK group

teamSelectModal.title: You are not on the team
teamSelectModal.description: To be able to play, you can join a team or create your own.

editModal.success: Your profile has been successfully changed!

successReportModal.title: Your complaint has been accepted.
successReportModal.text: The MatchUp team will review your application for a player and take actions in relation to him, we will inform you about the development of further actions in the profile notification block

successRecoverModal.title: Letter sent!
successRecoverModal.text: Check your email, we have sent instructions on how to change your password.

successRegistrationModal.text: Your account has been successfully created. Thank you for being with us!
